descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/HexR1.png[/img]

[center]An armor mod by Hothtrooper44.[/center]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/zi8Yf.png[/img]
"Dragonhide Robes" is a lore friendly, stand alone, heavy armor, light armor, or cloth set for all genders and races. One of the main focuses of Skyrim is the slaying of dragons. Those who wear heavy or light armor have had options to wear their dragon trophies since release, and now so can the cloth wearing mages!

As one might expect, the robes are is crafted from various dragon trophy drops such as scales and bones. The heavy set has equivalent stats to dragonbone armor, the light set is equivalent to dragonscale armor, and the cloth set has 0 armor so it can be used by mages who prefer the armor increasing spells. The heavy and light sets require the dragon smithing perk and can be created in a normal forge. The cloth set requires no perks since it has no stats, and can be created at a tanning rack. This is a new fun way for mages to make use of their dragon trophies and wear them proudly!

The set has two helmet options, one with a dragonbone crown adorning the magelike dragonscaled hood, and one version with just the hood.

[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/VHw4F.png[/img][youtube]_aLukS_CjoI[/youtube][img]http://i.imgur.com/imGL2.png[/img][/center]

[center]Feedback on the armor should be left in the comments section. I will read all the comments made and consider requests for alterations and potential fixes.

** If you like it, endorse it! **[/center]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/V7oPN.png[/img]
I would like to take this small space to thank the users of my mods, and the Nexus community at large. I am honored to be a part of this community, and to contribute to it. Thank you for your patronage of my work, whether it comes through comments, endorsements, or even a kind donation. You are the reason that I spend long hours of work bettering Skyrim. The Nexus community is the reason I continue to create mods. Thank you.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/e0Fcw.png[/img]
If you wish to use this armor set for your mod, please ask me by message first.
I do wish to help other mods and the community at large with my work, so don't hold back from asking!
